mapper.select: SELECT E.EMP_NO, E.EMP_NAME, E.BIRTH, E.EMAIL, E.MOBILE, E.ROLE, E.PROFILE_PATH, D.DEPT_NO, D.DEPT_NAME, P.POS_NO, P.POS_NAME FROM EMPLOYEE E JOIN DEPARTMENT D ON E.DEPT_NO = D.DEPT_NO JOIN POSITION P ON E.POS_NO = P.POS_NO WHERE EMAIL = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO WORK ( WORK_NO , WORK_DATE , WORK_IN , WORK_OUT , WORK_TOTAL_TIME , WORK_STATE , LATE_YN , EMP_NO ) VALUES ( WORK_SEQ.NEXTVAL , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 'YYYY-MM-DD') , TO_DATE(TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'HH24:MI:SS'), 'HH24:MI:SS') , NULL , NULL , NULL , NULL , #{empNo} )
